Description: Generate deterministic manufacturing intent from SOE outputs without enabling human edits
Acceptance Criteria: DatumPlan generated deterministically and validated

Description: Create datum_plan.schema.json describing ordered manufacturing intent, steps, tests, evidence, and references to SOE decisions.
Acceptance Criteria: Schema validates; references SOE decision IDs; CI passes

Description: Generate DatumPlan from SOERun + core inputs as a pure function.
Acceptance Criteria: Same inputs produce identical DatumPlan JSON

Description: Translate SOE REQUIRE/INSERT_STEP actions into ordered DatumPlan steps.
Acceptance Criteria: SOE-required steps are flagged and ordered correctly

Description: Translate SOE test decisions into DatumPlan test sections (functional, env, reliability).
Acceptance Criteria: DatumPlan lists required tests with acceptance criteria references

Description: Translate SOE evidence requirements into DatumPlan evidence section with retention.
Acceptance Criteria: Evidence entries reference rule_id and retention policy

Description: Define canonical step types (SMT, REFLOW, CLEAN, BAKE, COAT, SELECTIVE_SOLDER, TEST, INSPECT).
Acceptance Criteria: All DatumPlan steps use canonical types

Description: Create examples/datum_plan.space.flight.json as regression anchor.
Acceptance Criteria: Golden plan matches generator output

Description: Generate execution-ready artifacts without enabling production use
Acceptance Criteria: Execution outputs generated and schema-validated

Description: Add schemas for stencil, placement, selective solder, lead form, programming, AOI, reflow.
Acceptance Criteria: All schemas validate and CI passes

Description: Generate stencil aperture + foil recommendations from PCB + BOM.
Acceptance Criteria: Stencil output references components and pitch correctly

Description: Generate placement intent (XYZ, rotation, side) without exporting machine files.
Acceptance Criteria: Placement intent lists refdes, coords, rotation

Description: Generate selective solder locations based on PTH analysis.
Acceptance Criteria: Selective solder intent lists locations and constraints

Description: Generate lead forming intent for applicable components.
Acceptance Criteria: Lead form entries reference refdes and target dimensions

Description: Generate programming intent when firmware load required.
Acceptance Criteria: Programming intent references firmware + verify step

Description: Expose manufacturing intent for review without edit capability
Acceptance Criteria: Ops can review intent but not change it

Description: Add GET /plans/{quote_id} returning DatumPlan.
Acceptance Criteria: Endpoint returns validated DatumPlan JSON

Description: Add GET /outputs/{plan_id} returning execution intent artifacts.
Acceptance Criteria: Endpoint returns validated execution outputs

Description: Display DatumPlan steps, tests, evidence, and SOE 'why' references.
Acceptance Criteria: Ops can view but not edit DatumPlan

Description: Display stencil/placement/solder/programming intent artifacts.
Acceptance Criteria: Outputs visible; no export or edit buttons

Description: Sprint 2 quality and safety gates
Acceptance Criteria: Intent layer is deterministic and immutable

Description: Golden tests ensure identical DatumPlan for identical inputs.
Acceptance Criteria: Golden tests pass

Description: Ensure DatumPlan objects are immutable post-generation.
Acceptance Criteria: Mutation attempts fail

Description: Add checks preventing human edits or override flags in Sprint 2 artifacts.
Acceptance Criteria: Agent CI fails on mutation attempts
